text: Parafrigoribacterium is a genus of bacteria from the family of Microbacteriaceae with one known species (Parafrigoribacterium mesophilum). Parafrigoribacterium mesophilum has been isolated from soil from the Bigeum Island in Korea. ==References== Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Parafrigoribacterium
